scripts.dev:agent1: SERVER_URL=http://localhost:3000 AGENT_NAME="Agent-1" AGENT_LOCATION="US-East" bun --watch run src/agent/main.ts
scripts.dev:agent2: SERVER_URL=http://localhost:3000 AGENT_NAME="Agent-2" AGENT_LOCATION="US-West" bun --watch run src/agent/main.ts
scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:agent1" "bun run dev:agent2"
